title: An Inside Look at the Ohio Team Pushing Back on Election Fraud Claims
description: The effort is one of several misinformation rapid response teams run by state and local officials to confront problematic online assertions that fuel voter distrust.

title: Elizabeth Holmes Denied New Trial and Is Set to Be Sentenced
description: The founder of the failed blood testing start-up Theranos faces a maximum sentence of 20 years in prison.

description: The new owner of Twitter has urged his followers to vote Republican.

title: Binance to Buy FTX in Megadeal of Crypto Exchanges
description: Binance, the world’s largest cryptocurrency exchange, said it reached a deal to buy one of its biggest rivals, FTX, amid fears that the crypto industry could be entering another meltdown.
